scripts.docker: USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop-compose.yaml run --tty --rm --service-ports --entrypoint /bin/ash client
scripts.docker:build: USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop-compose.yaml run --rm client run build
scripts.docker:dev: USER_ID=$(id -u ${USER}) GROUP_ID=$(id -g ${USER}) docker compose -f ../develop-compose.yaml up --build client
